# Load and preview data

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
path <- Sys.getenv("BZ_DATA_XLSX", unset = "data/raw/data.xlsx")
if (file.exists(path)) {
  df <- readxl::read_excel(path)
  dplyr::glimpse(df)
} else {
  message("Data not found at ", path, ". Place your .xlsx there or set BZ_DATA_XLSX.")
}
```

# Simple summary

```{r}
if (exists("df") && nrow(df) > 0) {
  df %>% group_by(institution, modality) %>% summarize(value = sum(value, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop")
}
```
